body_html: Just a wild guess, if the callback passed into the local async recv kernel is an erroneous remote send, would it appear to be stuck at the local recv? What's the downstream operator of that local recv?

body: Just a wild guess, if the callback passed into the local async recv kernel is an erroneous remote send, would it appear to be stuck at the local recv? What's the downstream operator of that local recv?
